channel.title: Comments on: Bootstrap 3 support for Simple Form
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Fernando Villalobos
item.dc:creator: Fernando Villalobos
item.description: Excelent work, it just required a little css tweaking for integration with Select2. Thanks guys!
item.content:encoded: Excelent work, it just required a little css tweaking for integration with Select2. Thanks guys!

item.title: By: Johnny Shields
item.dc:creator: Johnny Shields
item.description: Great work, this is awesome and much appreciated!
item.content:encoded: Great work, this is awesome and much appreciated!

item.title: By: Daniel Carneiro
item.dc:creator: Daniel Carneiro
item.description: It looks great!!! awesome work guys

item.title: By: Daniel Kehoe
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kehoe
item.description: Thanks for the support for Bootstrap 3. I'm sure many others will agree that your efforts are appreciated.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the support for Bootstrap 3. I’m sure many others will agree that your efforts are appreciated.
